issues.description: Using multiple if-else statements instead of case statement
suggestions: Replace with case statement for better synthesis
Use case data_in(3 downto 0) is when "0000" => result <= data_in; ... end case;
issues.reasoning: Case statements are more efficient for synthesis and easier to optimize.

suggestions: Use shift operations: 'result <= data_in sll 1;' instead of manual bit concatenation
Use arithmetic shift: 'result <= data_in(14 downto 0) & '0';' can be 'result <= data_in sll 1;'
issues.reasoning: Shift operations are more efficient and clearer than manual bit manipulation.

suggestions: Consider if default case is necessary
Use 'others' clause in case statement for better coverage
issues.reasoning: Explicit default handling can improve synthesis optimization.

issues.description: Process runs on every clock cycle without enable
suggestions: Add enable signal if processing is not needed every clock cycle
Consider if continuous processing is required
issues.reasoning: Unnecessary processing wastes power and resources.
